TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebPartZoneCollection extends System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class WebPartZoneCollection Inherits ReadOnlyCollectionBase

summary.span: 包含 控制項的唯讀集合。

span.span: Contains a read-only collection of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別包含的集合存在於 Web 組件頁面的控制項。The class contains the collection of controls that exist on a Web Parts page. 它主要供來追蹤和管理所有區域的控制項。It is used primarily by the control to track and manage all the zones. 控制會保留其唯讀區域在頁面上的集合的參考屬性。The control keeps a reference to the collection of zones on a page in its read-only property. 類別就很有用，當您想要在相同的時間執行多個區域或其內容的作業，或當您需要找出特定區域，然後檢查或變更其內容。The class is useful when you want to carry out operations on multiple zones or their contents at the same time, or when you need to locate a particular zone and examine or change its contents. 雖然集合中的區域本身則是唯讀的您無法變更集合物件本身的大小、 您仍然可以取得個別的區域集合中的參考和當您有個別的區域物件的參考，您可以變更其屬性值。Although the collection of zones itself is read-only and you cannot change the size of the collection object itself, you can still get references to the individual zones within the collection, and when you have a reference to an individual zone object, you can change its property values. 類別有兩個建構函式。The class has two constructors. 第一個， ，只是初始化新的空執行個體。The first one, , simply initializes an empty instance of a new . 第二個，傳入現有的區域集合來初始化集合。The second one, , initializes a collection by passing in an existing collection of zones. 類別包含屬性。The class contains an property. 這個屬性可讓您找到藉由傳遞字串識別碼在集合中的控制項。This property allows you to locate a control within the collection by passing in a string identifier. 藉由比對的值的字串識別碼位於區域屬性區域。The zone is located by matching the string identifier to the value of the property on a zone. 類別也有數種方法，可用來檢查或存取其內容。The class also has several methods that are useful for examining or accessing its contents. 方法會判斷集合中是否存在特定區域。The method determines whether a particular zone exists in the collection. 方法從集合複製到陣列物件。The method copies the collection to an array of objects. 最後，方法會傳回在集合內的特定區域的索引。Finally, the method returns the index of a particular zone within the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class. 程式碼範例包含三個部分： 兩個區段的程式碼，以及如何執行此範例的說明。The code example contains three parts: two sections of code, and an explanation of how to run the example. 程式碼範例的第一個部分是包含三種網頁其中每一個都包含單一伺服器控制項的控制項。The first part of the code example is a Web page that contains three controls, each of which contains a single server control. 雖然這些伺服器控制項都是標準控制項的 ASP.NET，才能做為控制在執行階段，因為它們位於區域。Although these server controls are all standard ASP.NET controls, they can act as controls at run time because they are placed within a zone. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/CS/webpartzonecollection_overview_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/VB/webpartzonecollection_overview_vb.aspx#1)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是部分類別包含程式碼示範的用法類別。The second part of the code example is the partial class that contains the code to demonstrate usage of the class. 這個程式碼處理網頁上的事件。This code handles the events for the Web page. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/CS/webpartzonecollection_overview.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/VB/webpartzonecollection_overview.vb#2)] 載入瀏覽器中。Load the page in a browser. 三個區域會顯示其所包含的伺服器控制項。The three zones are visible with their contained server controls. 頁面底部附近是數個按鈕，其中每個示範如何使用的某些方面物件。Near the bottom of the page are several buttons, each of which demonstrates some aspect of working with the object. 按一下以查看其效果的區域和其內容上的每個按鈕。Click each button to see its effect on the zones and their contents. 若要檢視每個按鈕示範的某些方面與相關聯的程式碼物件，為這個程式碼範例的第二個部分參考上述的部分類別檔案中檢視的程式碼。To view the code associated with each button that demonstrates some aspect of the object, view the code in the partial class file referenced above as the second part of this code example.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式由控制項，Web 組件控制項集合中，其他控制項或自訂的開發人員程式碼，若要建立的唯讀集合存在於 Web 組件頁面的控制項。The constructor is used by the control, by other controls in the Web Parts control set, or by custom developer code, to create a read-only collection of the controls that exist on a Web Parts page.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的空執行個體。

span.span: Initializes an empty instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項使用自己的建構函式內的這個建構函式來初始化的新執行個體Web 組件頁面的類別。The control uses this constructor within its own constructor to initialize a new instance of the class for a Web Parts page.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.ICollection webPartZones) cil managed

span.span: An of objects.

summary.span: 透過傳入 物件的集合，初始化 類別的執行個體。

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class by passing in a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用建構函式，當您想要建立的自訂集合執行以程式設計方式在其上作業的物件。Use the constructor when you want to create a custom collection of objects to carry out programmatic operations on them. 例如，您無法存取屬性並建立子集物件在 Web 組件頁面上，將它們指派物件，然後再執行作業的子控制項上的該子集的各種屬性區域。For example, you could access the property and create a subset of objects on a Web Parts page, assigning them to a object, and then carry out operations on the child controls or various properties of only that subset of zones. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建構函式。The following code example demonstrates the use of the constructor. 此範例的完整程式碼的範例 > 一節中找到類別概觀。The complete code for the example is found in the Example section of the class overview. 在下列程式碼區段中，請注意它會將指派物件給變數，以擷取的值，來屬性。In the following section of code, notice that it assigns a object to a variable by retrieving the value of the property. 如果您想，而不是指派來自所有區域屬性，您可以建立的陣列物件包含在頁面上，所有區域的子集，並將陣列指派給新物件。If you wanted, rather than assigning all the zones from the property, you could create an array of objects containing a subset of all the zones on the page, and assign the array to a new object. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/CS/webpartzonecollection_overview.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/VB/webpartzonecollection_overview.vb#6)] 在集合建立後，您就可以輕鬆地逐一查看集合，並在所有包含的區域或其內容上執行作業。After the collection is created, you can easily iterate through the collection and perform operations on all the contained zones or their contents. 若要執行範例程式碼，載入網頁瀏覽器，並按一下**切換動詞命令呈現模式**按鈕上的每個區域。To execute the example code, load the page in a browser, and click the **Toggle Verb Render Mode** button on each zone. 替代項目區域中包含的每個伺服器控制項的標題列中的動詞命令的呈現方式。This alternates how the verbs in the title bar of each server control contained in a zone are rendered. 動詞命令會顯示在下拉式清單的功能表中，或直接連結的標題列中。The verbs can appear in a drop-down menu, or directly as links in the title bar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您檢查特定物件，並判斷它是否在集合。The method enables you to check a particular object and determine whether it is in a collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. 此範例中，包括使用者控制項、 頁面，其中包含區域和包含的程式碼，部分類別檔案的完整程式碼的範例 > 一節中找到類別概觀。The complete code for the example, including a user control, a page containing the zones, and a partial class file that contains the code, is found in the Example section of the class overview. 下一節的程式碼示範如何使用方法。The following section of code demonstrates usage of the method. 若要執行的程式碼，載入網頁瀏覽器，並按一下**coll包含 WebPartZone2** 按鈕。To execute the code, load the page in a browser, and click the **Coll. Contains WebPartZone2** button. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/CS/webpartzonecollection_overview.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/VB/webpartzonecollection_overview.vb#3)]

span.span: Copies the collection to an array of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法很有用，當您想要建立自訂的陣列，可以包含在區域集合，這些區域的子集或這些區域的超集。The method is useful when you want to create a custom array that can contain the zones in the collection, a subset of those zones, or a superset of those zones. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. 此範例中，包括使用者控制項、 頁面，其中包含區域和包含的程式碼，部分類別檔案的完整程式碼的範例 > 一節中找到類別概觀。The complete code for the example, including a user control, a page containing the zones, and a partial class file that contains the code, is found in the Example section of the class overview. 下一節的程式碼示範如何使用方法。The following section of the code demonstrates usage of the method. 若要執行的程式碼，載入網頁瀏覽器，並按一下**陣列區域名稱** 按鈕。To execute the code, load the page in a browser, and click the **Zone Names from Array** button. 區域的集合會載入到陣列，而所有區域 Id 會都複製到標籤。The collection of zones is loaded into an array, and all zone IDs are copied into a label. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/CS/webpartzonecollection_overview.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/VB/webpartzonecollection_overview.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會很有用，如果您有多個區域上的 Web 組件頁面上，而且您需要知道一個區域比其他區域的序數位置。The method is useful if you have multiple zones on a Web Parts page, and you need to know the ordinal position of one zone relative to the other zones. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. 此範例中，包括使用者控制項、 頁面，其中包含區域和包含的程式碼，部分類別檔案的完整程式碼的範例 > 一節中找到類別概觀。The complete code for the example, including a user control, a page containing the zones, and a partial class file that contains the code, is found in the Example section of the class overview. 下一節的程式碼示範如何使用方法。The following section of code demonstrates usage of the method. 若要執行的程式碼，載入網頁瀏覽器，並按一下**WebPartZone1 索引** 按鈕。To execute the code, load the page in a browser, and click the **WebPartZone1 Index** button. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/CS/webpartzonecollection_overview.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/VB/webpartzonecollection_overview.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您存取物件內集合表示在集合中的序數位置的索引編號。The property enables you to access a object within a collection by using an index number that represents its ordinal position in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您存取物件內透過字串識別項的特定區域的集合。The property enables you to access a object within a collection by using a string identifier for a particular zone. 所有比對的字串識別項不區分大小寫。All matching on string identifiers is case-insensitive.
